interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kiss Gel Fantasy Ready-to-Wear Gel 24 Nails KGN53 Olivia (2 Pack)
Review Date: 2019/01/24
Store: KISS
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Size': '2 Pack', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'KISS', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 4.53 x 1.89 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Ivy Enterprises, Inc.'}
Review Text: Great nails. The best brand I have found. I wear them all of the time. If taken care of they will last about a week. I have found that if you put a top coat or clear polish on top the color doesn't wear off the tips as much adding to the lasting color. I used to do my own nails but got tired of having to wait for the polish to dry especially when in a hurry. These you can put a drop or so of glue and they stay on without damaging your nails. I wear gloves when I do the dishes and clean so they last long. I get compliments all of the time.
Review Title: Great nails!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
TAKIYA 72pcs Mixed Assorted Style Full Cover Acrylic False Artificial Nail Tips (3 Boxes，Not Includes Glue)
{'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.06 x 6.65 x 1.06 inches; 2.54 Ounces'}
These are very thin and cheap. Even the designs rub off within a day or two. When I wore the first pair pair I thought it might just be a fluke that they kept breaking off and the design came off. So, I tried a second set. The same thing happened. Just tossed the 3rd set.
Don't waste you money!
Kiss Gel Fantasy Ready-to-Wear Gel 24 Nails KGN53 Olivia (2 Pack)
KISS
{'Size': '2 Pack', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'KISS', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 4.53 x 1.89 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Ivy Enterprises, Inc.'}
Great nails. The best brand I have found. I wear them all of the time. If taken care of they will last about a week. I have found that if you put a top coat or clear polish on top the color doesn't wear off the tips as much adding to the lasting color. I used to do my own nails but got tired of having to wait for the polish to dry especially when in a hurry. These you can put a drop or so of glue and they stay on without damaging your nails. I wear gloves when I do the dishes and clean so they last long. I get compliments all of the time.
Great nails!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to show a strong interest in artificial nails, particularly favoring acrylic and gel options that offer full coverage and aesthetic appeal.
- **Quality Concern**: The user has affirmed a continued preference for high-quality products, as demonstrated through a positive recent experience with a brand regarded for durability. They maintain a clear expectation for longevity and craftsmanship in their purchases.
- **Style Dislike**: The user remains averse to products that wear quickly or lack design integrity, reinforcing a preference for styles that balance aesthetics with performance.
- **Frustration with Performance**: Previous frustrations with low-quality products contrast with their recent satisfaction, indicating a nuanced understanding of different brands and their offerings.
- **Rating Behavior**: The user has shifted towards a more favorable rating for quality products, but continues to voice concerns over durability and performance, reflecting a commitment to honest reviews.
- **Buying Caution**: While the user shows cautious tendencies in purchasing, their latest interaction reveals an openness to specific brands that have demonstrated reliable performance, suggesting a more confident approach to selecting products based on past positive experiences.

Overall, the user's behavior remains focused on achieving quality and durability in beauty products while adapting their preferences based on new experiences with reputable brands.
